docblock.description: Returns a list of all the available deployed instances in a JaxbDeploymentUnitList instance.
Returns a JaxbDeploymentUnit instance containing th e information (including the configuration) of the deployment unit.
Deploys the deployment unit referenced by the deploymentId.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Deployment descriptor as a key-value pair: array('audit-mode'=>'JMS', 'runtime-strategy'=>'PER_PROCESS_INSTANCE');

docblock.description: Undeploys the deployment unit referenced by the deploymentId.
Makes REST calls to the execution server. All calls are described on the documentation.

docblock.description: Starts a process and retrieves the list of variables associated with the process instance.
Does a (read only) retrieval of the process instance. This operation will fail (code 400) if the process instance has been completed.

tag.name: return
tag.description: a JaxbGenericResponse indicating whether or not the operation has succeeded

tag.name: return
tag.description: a JaxbGenericResponse indicating whether or not the operation has succeeded.

docblock.description: Gets a list of ProcessInstanceLog instances.
Gets the ProcessInstanceLog instance associated with the specified process instance.
Gets a list of ProcessInstanceLog instances associated with any child/sub-processes associated with the specified process instance.
Gets a list of VariableInstanceLog instances associated with the specified process instance.
Makes REST calls to the execution server. All calls are described on the documentation.
Convert map associative array into query map parameters.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Identifies the user or group to which the task is delegated

tag.name: param
tag.description: Identifies the user or group to which the task is forwarded

tag.name: param
tag.description: Identifies the user(s) or group(s) that are nominated for the task

docblock.description: Checks that the task idetified by taskId exists and generates an URL to show the task form on a remote application

tag.name: return
tag.description: JaxbTaskFormResponse instance, that contains the URL to the task form

docblock.description: The returned tasks should have the potential owner identified by the parameter given.

tag.name: return
tag.description: JaxbTaskSummaryListResponse with a list of TaskSummaryImpl instances

tag.name: param
tag.description: This is the URL of the deployed jbpm-console, kie-wb or BPMS instance. For example: http://localhost:8080/jbpm-console/

tag.name: param
tag.description: This is the name (id) of the deployment the RuntimeEngine should interact with.

tag.name: param
tag.description: This is the user name needed to access the REST API.

tag.name: param
tag.description: This is the password needed to access the REST API.

docblock.description: Returns a new instance of Runtime_Service class.
